hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; case "$file_path" in *.js|*.ts|*.jsx|*.tsx|*.json|*.jsonc|*.css|*.graphql) ./node_modules/.bin/biome format --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true ;; esac; }
git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep -E '\.(js|ts|jsx|tsx|json|jsonc|css|graphql)$' | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/biome check --fix --unsafe 2>/dev/null || true
